definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor

sentences.english: He that can compose himself is wiser than he that composes books.
sentences.chinese: 能够平抚自己的情绪，比能够提笔写书更有智慧。

sentences.english: The aim of yoga is to clam the chaos ofconflictiing impulses.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽的目的是平抚矛盾中的挣扎的心。

sentences.english: On the other hand, aroma therapy can ease and sooth your neural system.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，芳香療法可以平抚脑神经系统。

definition: to flatten/to smooth down/to unwrinkle/(fig.) to soothe (emotional wounds)/to heal (scars)
to pacify/to calm down/to be cured/to be healed
to relieve/to ease (pressure)/to alleviate/to remove/to get rid of
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
to pacify/to calm/calm/quiet/to lie on one's belly
to mediate/to reconcile/to make peace/to intervene
to wriggle/(fig.) to stir up trouble/(of a sentiment) to stir
